text: Altenkunstadt is a municipality in Lichtenfels in Bavaria, Germany. It is on the left or south edge of the river Main across the valley from Burgkunstadt which is on the hillside to the north. ==Sons and daughters== * Wolfgang Mack (1808-1883), German surgeon * Alfred Nikolaus Witt (1914-1999), orthopedist and surgeon, university professor in Berlin and Munich * Josef Seiz (1934-2010), German table tennis player ==References== Category:Lichtenfels (district)
title: Altenkunstadt
